title: Is Time Running out for Primož Roglič and His Tour de France Dream? Bora-Bull Backs Veteran Leader: ‘He’s Not Too Old’
content:
Uncertainty over Vuelta a España after an off-key debut with Red Bull 'super team' leaves 34-year-old at risk of losing the wheels of the Pogačar era.

Read the full article at Is Time Running out for Primož Roglič and His Tour de France Dream? Bora-Bull Backs Veteran Leader: ‘He’s Not Too Old’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
